comments:
N20050525

- folding enabled
- open a file from the CVS history

-> depending on the relative file size, either syntax highlighting is wrong or I
get the excpetion below.

Fix is to only delay setting the visible document if enabling the projection
mode succeeded.

Looked at the fix.
Approving for RC1.

Something similar happens when opening an empty file or a file that has no
folding areas. The real thing is to check in JavaSourceViewer.setVisibleDocument
whether the call to enableProjection() had the effect of replacing the visible
document. If not, we need to continue as ususal.
